data.title: 2024 Baseball
data.meta_site_name: Penn State Athletics Official Athletics Website
data.text:
BEFORE PSU

Was a two-way player at California University of Pennsylvania…Played in 102 games, making 83 starts…At the plate, batted .251 with 68 hits, including 10 doubles, seven triples, six homers, 33 RBI and 39 runs. Owned a .406 slugging percentage and 13 stolen bases…In 2023, batted .289 with 26 hits, including four doubles and four triples, five RBI and 12 runs. He tallied a .422 slugging percentage and a .354 on-base percentage. Notched seven steals. On the mound, appeared in 11 games, earning three wins and a 4.50 ERA in 12 innings. Recorded 13 strikeouts and held opponents to a .163 average…In 2022, played in 19 games, starting 11, with 10 hits, four RBI and six runs…In 2021, collected 24 hits, including three doubles, three triples and four homers, 15 RBI and 19 runs. Had a .441 slugging percentage. Was named All-PSAC West second team as a designated hitter…In 2020, tallied eight hits, including two homers, and nine RBI in 11 games (nine starts).

HIGH SCHOOL

Was a three-year letterwinner at Thomas Jefferson High School under head coach Kevin Gryboski.

PERSONAL

Son of David and Traci Lee…Has one sister…Father, David, played baseball at Allegany College in Maryland and five seasons in the MLB with the Colorado Rockies, San Diego Padres and Cleveland Indians…Majored in health science at California (Pa.)
